name: js-data-http
description: HTTP (XHR) adapter for js-data in the browser.
author: js-data-http project authors

scripts.lint: repo-tools lint karma.start.js karma.conf.js src/**/*.js test/*.test.js fetch/karma.*.js node/mocha.start.js scripts/*.js
scripts.doc: jsdoc -c conf.json src node_modules/js-data-adapter/src && node scripts/cleanup.js
scripts.webpack: webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config node/webpack.config.js && webpack --config fetch/webpack.config.js
scripts.gzip: echo js-data-http gzipped size: $(cat dist/js-data-http.min.js | gzip -f9 | wc -c)kb
scripts.gzip_fetch: echo js-data-fetch gzipped size: $(cat fetch/dist/js-data-fetch.min.js | gzip -f9 | wc -c)kb
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run webpack && npm run min && npm run min_fetch && npm run version && npm run banner
scripts.cover: istanbul cover -x node/dist/js-data-http-node-tests.js --hook-run-in-context node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 20000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register node/mocha.start.js test/*.test.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run karma && npm run karma_fetch && npm run cover
scripts.repo-tools: repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
scripts.release: npm test && npm run doc && npm run repo-tools
